summary: This is an internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, sent on January 3, 2020, alerting colleagues that 60 Minutes might run a feature on Jeffrey Epstein that Sunday night. The information came from another outlet, and no further details were available at the time.

events.title: Potential 60 Minutes Epstein Feature
events.description: 60 Minutes might run a feature on Jeffrey Epstein this Sunday night, according to information from a different outlet.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was aware of a potential 60 Minutes feature on Jeffrey Epstein in early January 2020.
The information about the 60 Minutes segment came from a different media outlet, not directly from 60 Minutes.
The email was sent on January 3, 2020, indicating the feature was potentially scheduled for that Sunday, January 5, 2020.
The email shows internal communication within the Department of Justice regarding media coverage of the Epstein case.
No specific details about the content of the potential 60 Minutes feature were known at the time of the email.
